original_text: But if the man has no next of kin to whom restitution may be made for the wrong, the restitution for wrong shall go to the Lord for the priest, in addition to the ram of atonement with which atonement is made for him.
korean_text: 만일 죄 값을 받을 만한 친척이 없으면 그 죄 값을 여호와께 드려 제사장에게로 돌릴 것이니 이는 그를 위하여 속죄할 속죄의 숫양과 함께 돌릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But if the man has no next of kin
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 사람에게 대신 받을 친족이 없으면

sentences.original_text: to whom restitution may be made for the wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 잘못에 대한 변상을 받을 사람이 없으면

sentences.original_text: the restitution for wrong shall go to the Lord for the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그 잘못에 대한 변상은 제사장을 위해 주께 돌아가고

sentences.original_text: in addition to the ram of atonement
with which atonement is made for him
